00040 namespace CrissCross
00041 {
00042     namespace IO
00043     {
00045         class CoreConsole:public CoreIO
00046         {
00047           public:
00048 
00050             typedef enum
00051             {
00052                 FG_BLUE = 0x0001,        
00053                 FG_GREEN = 0x0002,        
00054                 FG_RED = 0x0004,        
00055                 FG_INTENSITY = 0x0008,    
00056                 BG_BLUE = 0x0010,        
00057                 BG_GREEN = 0x0020,        
00058                 BG_RED = 0x0040,        
00059                 BG_INTENSITY = 0x0080,    
00060         #    if !defined ( ANSI_COLOUR ) && defined ( TARGET_OS_WINDOWS )
00061                 FG_BROWN = 0x0000,                
00062                 FG_MAGENTA = FG_BLUE | FG_RED,    
00063                 FG_CYAN = FG_BLUE | FG_GREEN,    
00064                 BG_BROWN = 0x0000,                
00065                 BG_MAGENTA = BG_BLUE | BG_RED,    
00066                 BG_CYAN = BG_GREEN | BG_BLUE,                            
00067                 FG_GRAY = FG_BLUE | FG_GREEN | FG_RED,                    
00068                 FG_WHITE = FG_BLUE | FG_GREEN | FG_RED | FG_INTENSITY,    
00069                 BG_GRAY = BG_BLUE | BG_GREEN | BG_RED,                    
00070                 BG_WHITE = BG_BLUE | BG_GREEN | BG_RED | BG_INTENSITY    
00071         #    elif defined ( ANSI_COLOUR )
00072                 FG_BROWN = 0x0100,        
00073                 FG_MAGENTA = 0x0200,        
00074                 FG_CYAN = 0x0400,        
00075                 BG_BROWN = 0x0800,        
00076                 BG_MAGENTA = 0x1000,        
00077                 BG_CYAN = 0x2000,        
00078                 FG_GRAY = 0x4000,        
00079                 FG_WHITE = 0x8000,        
00080                 BG_GRAY = 0x10000,        
00081                 BG_WHITE = 0x20000        
00082         #    endif
00083             } ColourTypes;
00084 
00085           public:
00086

00089               CoreConsole ();
00090 
00092 
00097               CoreConsole ( FILE * _outputBuffer );
00098 
00100              ~CoreConsole ();

00110

00136             int Seek ( int _position );
00137             size_t Length ();
00138             size_t Read ( char *_buffer, int _bufferLength, int _bufferIndex,
00139                           int _count );
00140         };
